name: rake-pos
description: A typescript implementation of the Rapid Automated Keyword Extraction (RAKE) algorithm with Part-of-Speech post-processing
author: Harris Lo

scripts.clean: rm -rf package-lock.json dist build coverage node_modules
scripts.preversion:
echo '
Usage:
npm version <major|minor|patch> -f -m "Some message to commit"

' && npm run test && git add .
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm publish
